action_cards.name: Teleport
action_cards.text: teleport to an available location of your choosing.

action_cards.name: Rules Reset
action_cards.text: When played, all rules will be returned to their base values from the start of the game.

action_cards.name: Pick up all keepers
action_cards.text: When played, all players must pick up all their keepers in play.

action_cards.name: Trade Hands
action_cards.text: When played, choose a player to trade hands with.

action_cards.name: Reset One Rule
action_cards.text: When played, choose 1 rule to reset.

action_cards.name: Reset half of rules(upto)
action_cards.text: When played, choose up to half the rules to reset.

action_cards.name: Draw 3, Play 2
action_cards.text: Draw 3 cards, out of those 3 cards you must choose 2 to play and finally discard the remaining card.

action_cards.name: Draw 2, Use'em
action_cards.text: Draw 2 cards and immediately use them.

action_cards.name: Draw 5, discard 2
action_cards.text: Draw 5 cards, out of those 5 cards you must choose 3 to play and finally discard the remaining cards.

action_cards.name: Steal A Keeper
action_cards.text: Choose a keeper on field to take into your possession.

action_cards.name: Exchange Keepers
action_cards.text: Choose 2 keepers on the field and swap their locations.

action_cards.name: Everyone Discard 1
action_cards.text: Draw 2 cards and immediately use them.
